body:
### Welcome to my homepage.
I am a Software Engineer with research experience in Machine Learning and Computer Vision.
Additionally, I'm interested in entrepreneurship, civic action and also enjoy writing.
You can read my book "A nossa vez" in digital formats for free (in portuguese).

### Publications

"Improving Object Classification using Pose Information", H. Penedones, R. Collobert, F. Fleuret, D. Grangier - Idiap Research Report 2011 (pdf)

"Playground Learning for Object Detection", H. Penedones, F. Fleuret - Idiap Internal Research Report 2009

"Predicting Venus Express Thermal Power Consumption", H. Penedones, B. Sousa, A. Donati, J. Martinez-Heras - SpaceOps 2008 Conference Proceedings - Heidelberg, Germany. (pdf)

### Author

@hpenedones
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Hugo Penedones
